Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What do you think about asking for a 
volunteer to make an timeline for the 
RPG's events? One that would be 
updated fairly oftee. 

  o I'd like to see that happen. 
  o I think we should concentrate on other things first. 
  o I like the idea, and would consider volunteering. 
  o I'm neither against it, nor for it. 
  o I'm against the idea. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
